channel.title: Visualization roadmap
channel.description:
@jesse @arikfr Could you give a sense of where Redash will be / should be going in terms of visualization capabilities?
* Are there new visualization types on the horizon? * Are any visualization types likely to be deprecated or that have a lot of issues today? * Are there any planned (or needed) significant changes in the visualization infrastructure?

item.title: Visualization roadmap
item.dc:creator: ilyaminati
item.description:
@jesse @arikfr Could you give a sense of where Redash will be / should be going in terms of visualization capabilities?

  • Are there new visualization types on the horizon?

  • Are there any planned (or needed) significant changes in the visualization infrastructure?
